subject: Re: FW: Website update - COMING SOON locations

action.text: Allie Borcena assigned to Allie Borcena

full_threads.body:
Hi Carly, 

Thanks for submitting your request. Confirming that Carnes Hill store page has now been updated and is live and we've also updated the map radius which will show all store locations across Sydney.

Here is the link: https://johnnygiospizza.com.au/our-locations/

Please let us know if you would like any further changes.

Quick note: If you have a new concern or an additional task related to a previous ticket, please send it through in a new email. This helps us keep things clear and respond more efficiently.

Hi Carly,

We're on this.

We will update this morning and confirm.

Hi Cindy - can you please set the Carnes Hill store page live asap?

We opened yesterday, 17 June and at the moment it is still saying "coming soon'



In addition, do you know why when I land on the "our locations" page that the Carnes Hill flag doesn't come up in the map of all store locations across Sydney?



Thanks for your help - cheers, Carly

Carly King

Marketing Manager



www.Johnnygiospizza.com.au

Ph: 0403 822 913

E: carly@johnnygiospizza.com.au

Hi Carly.

I have updated the images and also added the Tony Supremo since it's not existing at the moment.

Let me know if there's anything else.

Thanks for this! Looks great - thank you.

Can I trouble you to also please update some images on our homepage? See attached, recently re-shot and looking better than what we have currently.

Are the files too big?

Please let me know - thanks, Carly

Carly King

Marketing Manager



www.Johnnygiospizza.com.au

Ph: 0403 822 913

E: carly@johnnygiospizza.com.au

Hi Carly.

Just a quick update on the recent changes we've made:
  • Promotional Popup: Updated with new content featuring Cheesy Hot Honey Bread
  • Address Updates: Applied to the following locations:
    • Carnes Hill
    • Mona Vale
    • Chatswood
  • Carnes Hill Update:
    • Store details are now visible in the store locator on the homepage.
    • The "Coming Soon" label has been removed.
    • The redirect to the store’s specific page hasn’t been implemented yet, as I understand it will only be accessible starting the 17th.

Please let me know if there’s anything else we can help with!

Hi Carly.

Great to hear from you!

We’ll action this tomorrow and will schedule the Carnes Hill page to go live on the 17th.

I’ll keep you posted once everything is completed.

Hi Cindy - can I brief you on a couple of things for our website please?

Carnes Hill - opens next week on June 17

So will need to set up the page to be ready for lunch time on Tuesday 17th, if that's ok?

Address and phone details here:

Shop7, Carnes Hill Marketplace

Cnr Cowpasture & Kurrajong Roads

Horingsea Park, NSW 2171

Phone: 02 7240 6727

Can you please also trouble you please to update the address details for Chatswood and Mona Vale now? Still coming soon, but with their address details ie

Mona Vale

4 Bungan Street, Mona Vale, NSW 2103

Chatswood

220 Victoria Avenue, Chatswood, NSW 2067

In addition, I'd like to update the promotional pop up on the site, to feature our new Cheesy Hot Honey bread.

The link to the video is here:

https://youtu.be/tluXobh6EJ4

The copy for the pop-up is here:

Johnny Gio's new Cheesy Hot Honey Bread is golden, gooey and totally indulgent.

Hand stretched dough, baked to crispy perfection, oozing with melted mozzarella and smoked scarmoza, then smothered with Johnny Gio's signature hot honey for that perfect sweet and spicy kick.

Crackly on the outside, soft in the middle, and dangerously addictive. You won't be able to stop at one. Get on to it!

Any problems please let me know - thanks, Carly

Carly King

Marketing Manager



www.Johnnygiospizza.com.au

Ph: 0403 822 913

E: carly@johnnygiospizza.com.au

Hi Carly.

All updates completed.
  • Removed post code on Mona Vale, NSW and Braddon, ACT
  • Added NSW in Carnes Hill

@cindy please make sure you track your time like this. Very important to ensure we share in the value we create and keep investing in building the time.

(Time: 30mins).

Thanks so much for this 😊

Couple of quick points - can you remove the postcode on the Mona Vale listing? Screen grab here:



And would you mind please adding , NSW after Carnes Hill in this list, for consistency?



Thanks heaps - Carly

Carly King

Marketing Manager



www.Johnnygiospizza.com.au

Ph: 0403 822 913

E: carly@johnnygiospizza.com.au

Hi Carly.

We have updated the coming soon locations on the store locator map.

I have attached a screenshot for your reference.

We also removed the links on the locations as well to avoid redirects on incomplete pages.

Please let me know if there's anything else that needs to be updated.

Amazing, thanks Cindy.

Carly King

Marketing Manager



www.Johnnygiospizza.com.au

Ph: 0403 822 913

E: carly@johnnygiospizza.com.au
